Name: Rusty Compass cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Peaty Islay single malt whisky lightly sweetened and flavoured with heather honey herbal whisky liqueur and cherry brandy, stirred and served on-the-rocks with an orange zest twist adding zestiness.
History: Based on a cocktail originally made with Compass Box The Peat Monster Malt Scotch Whisky and served straight-up in a coupe.
